We are proud to announce our Head of Customs Operations in Thailand, Sakon Naiyananon, has completed the Custom Specialist Program from the Thai Customs Department. As a Certified Customs Specialist, Mr. Sakon and his team will support our customers with up-to-date, reliable and valuable information.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: Congratulations to our new Certified Customs Specialist – Sakon Naiyananon

seo.title: Congratulations to our new Certified Customs Specialist - Sakon Naiyananon - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: Congratulations to our new Certified Customs Specialist - Sakon Naiyananon - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: We are proud to announce our Head of Customs Operations in Thailand, Sakon Naiyananon, has completed the Custom Specialist Program from the Thai Customs Department. As a Certified Customs Specialist, Mr. Sakon and his team will support our customers with up-to-date, reliable and valuable information. Contact us to have our professionals keeping you ahead of… Continue reading Congratulations to our new Certified Customs Specialist – Sakon Naiyananon

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We are proud to announce our Head of Customs Operations in Thailand, Sakon Naiyananon, has completed the Custom Specialist Program from the Thai Customs Department. As a Certified Customs Specialist, Mr. Sakon and his team will support our customers with up-to-date, reliable and valuable information.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Contact us to have our professionals keeping you ahead of any changes in international businesses and the global supply chain.
